blogPost.excerpt: Using Instil, you can teach what you love to students across the globe in a live format. It could be an academic subject, hobby or skill, lifestyle subjects, bootcamps, or anything else.
blogPost.body: Using Instil, you can teach what you love to students across the globe in a live format. It could be an academic subject, hobby or skill, lifestyle subjects, bootcamps, or anything else.
blogPost.title: Instil - Instil helps you create, manage, and monetise live classes.
blogPost.author: Zed A

localize.description: 使用Instil，您可以以直播的形式向全球各地的学生传授您喜爱的知识。它可以是学术科目、爱好或技能、生活方式科目、训练营或其他任何东西。
localize.tagline: Instil帮助你创建、管理和盈利直播课程。

localize.description: 使用Instil，您可以以直播的形式向全球各地的學生傳授您喜愛的知識。它可以是學術科目、愛好或技能、生活方式科目、訓練營或其他任何東西。
localize.tagline: Instil幫助你創建、管理和盈利直播課程。

previous.excerpt: People shifting to telegram groups from Whatsapp can now import all their chats easily.
previous.title: Whatsapp Chats Importer - Import Whatsapp Group Chats to Telegram.

localize.description: 从Whatsapp转移到telegram群组的人现在可以轻松导入他们所有的聊天记录。
從Whatsapp轉移到telegram羣組的人現在可以輕鬆導入他們所有的聊天記錄。

next.excerpt: An easy to use, privacy-focused alternative to the big analytics platforms that keeps everyone anonymous and puts you in charge. Created and hosted in the EU, powered by renewable energy.
next.title: Microanalytics.io - Privacy-focussed alternative to the big analytics platforms.

localize.description: 一个易于使用，注重隐私的替代方案，可以让每个人都匿名，让你负责。在欧盟创建和托管，由可再生能源提供动力。
localize.tagline: 注重隐私的大分析平台的替代品。

localize.description: 一個易於使用，注重隱私的替代方案，可以讓每個人都匿名，讓你負責。在歐盟創建和託管，由可再生能源提供動力。
localize.tagline: 注重隱私的大分析平臺的替代品。
